name: 行動文學：腳本寫作及其應用
restrict: ◎限大二大三大四 ◎限碩一碩二碩三以上修習
goals: To write a good video game story with marketable values and educational purposes
syllabus:
**Course description:**

This course aims to inspire students to explore the potential of English scriptwriting and content creation with a specific focus on its advantageous uses in social media. The course will be using the history, culture, and nightlife of NTNU and its surroundings as the framework for creating content for social media Apps. The course is structured around three workshops: multi-media map making, script writing for multi-layer maps, and YouTube content creation (taught by actual successful Taiwan-based YouTubers). In addition, students will go on guided tours of NTNU and its surroundings (hosted by professional tour guide) and have one-off invited talks from Taiwanese social media content creators who have used English to increase their following. Each workshop is taught by experts in the field, who will guide the students to acquire necessary skills in scriptwriting in the process of completing individual and team projects.   

**Requirements:**                                       

1.  Grading policy:

*   Workshop Presentation 40%
*   Final Project 30%
*   Class discussion & participation 20%
*   Attendance 10%
*   Bonus grade: 2-6%

1.  Regular attendance and punctuality in coming to the class are strongly desired. Exceptions are allowed only under emergent circumstances or notification in advance.
2.  Request for personal leave is granted only with justifiable causes.
3.  Plagiarizing or editing others’ writing without acknowledgement would result in failing the course.
4.  All assignments must be submitted punctually. Delay will result in deducted grade.
5.  Bonus grade is awarded based on in-class performance.
